caption.p: High-resolution δ 13C, δ 18O and geochemical proxy profiles in the latest Permian-Early Triassic strata from the measured section. Details are presented in Supplementary Tables S4 and S5. Abbreviations: Fm, Formation; PTB, Permian-Triassic boundary. Z.C.Z created this figure using CorelDRAW14. Footprints and pareiasaur body shape are schematically reconstructed.
